casebody.data:
CURTIS
v.
WAINWRIGHT 2018-1084 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 8, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On appellant's memorandum in support of jurisdiction. This cause originated in the court of appeals and, therefore, should proceed as an appeal of right pursuant to S.Ct.Prac.R. 5.01. The clerk shall issue an order for the transmission of the record from the Court of Appeals for Marion County, and the parties shall otherwise proceed in accordance with S.Ct.Prac.R. 16.02 through 16.07.
